dl.dd: Call this method to handle your application's "find" command. This opens the template.XULElem("findbar"), focuses the edit field for the search term, and selects its contents. The first time this is called for a given findbar, the findbar will flash to draw attention to itself. The mode should be one of FIND_NORMAL, FIND_TYPEAHEAD, or FIND_LINKS. If you don't pass a mode, the last-used mode for the same findbar is used. If the findbar hasn't been used before, FIND_NORMAL is the default.
